Executive Assistant

Company: Global Urban Strategies, ES

Location: San Salvador

Employment type: full-time

Availability: immediate

About Us:

Global is a dynamic marketing and communication agency that specializes in print and digital solutions for businesses and municipalities. We craft tailored strategies and content to help clients connect and thrive.

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Executive Assistant to be at the forefront of communication within the organization, acting as a liaison between executives, employees, clients, and external partners. Their primary objective is to facilitate the efficient functioning of the executive's office and contribute to the overall productivity of the organization.

Responsibilities:

  1. Calendar Management:
    • Schedule and manage appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements for executives.
    • Prioritize and coordinate conflicting schedules to optimize time management.
  2. Communication and Correspondence:
    • Manage and filter incoming communications, including emails, phone calls, and mail.
    • Draft and proofread correspondence and documents, ensuring accuracy and professionalism.
  3. Meeting Coordination:
    • Prepare meeting agendas, materials, and presentations as needed.
    • Attend meetings, take minutes, and distribute action items to appropriate parties.
  4. Travel and Logistics:
    • Arrange and coordinate travel itineraries, accommodations, and transportation for business trips.
    • Process expense reports and reconcile credit card statements in a timely manner.
  5. Documentation and Filing:
    • Organize and maintain electronic and physical filing systems, ensuring easy access and confidentiality of sensitive information.
  6. Office Management:
    • Assist in managing office supplies, equipment, and facilities, coordinating maintenance and repairs as necessary.
    • Oversee special projects and initiatives as assigned by executives.
  7. Task Prioritization and Time Management:
    • Assist in prioritizing tasks and managing deadlines to ensure efficient workflow and productivity for executives.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree preferred.
  • Experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience as an executive assistant or in a similar administrative role. While not mandatory, proven experience in Human Resources and/or Accounting is highly valuable.

Technical Skills:

  • English proficiency. Extensive knowledge of conversational English and technical vocabulary.
  • Proficient in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software.
  • Excellent typing and data entry skills.
  • Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Discretion and ability to handle confidential information.
  • Proactive and detail-oriented with a high level of initiative.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively in a team environment.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit a resume and cover letter to jackie@global-urban.com

Application Deadline: Tuesday, October 31st, 2023

Please note that not submitting the required documents (resume and cover letter) may lead to disqualification.
